results.title: Bopindolol and its metabolite 18-502 attenuate regional myocardial acidosis during partial occlusion of the coronary artery in dogs.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (1 mg/kg) decreased heart rate markedly and attenuated the regional @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@myocardial acidosis@@@ induced by @<m>DISEASE_Leukocyte_adhesion_deficiency_type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535887 @@@LAD partial occlusion@@@.

citations.NLM: Abiko Y, Gotoh H, Yokoyama T, Abiko T, Hashizume H, Akiyama K. Bopindolol and its metabolite 18-502 attenuate regional myocardial acidosis during partial occlusion of the coronary artery in dogs. Arch Int Pharmacodyn Ther. 1994 Jan-Feb;327(1):40-55. PMID: 7944827
citations.BibTeX: @article{7944827, title={Bopindolol and its metabolite 18-502 attenuate regional myocardial acidosis during partial occlusion of the coronary artery in dogs.}, author={Abiko Y and Gotoh H and Yokoyama T and Abiko T and Hashizume H and Akiyama K}, journal={Arch Int Pharmacodyn Ther}, volume={327}, number={1}, pages={40-55}}

results.title: A method for evaluating antianginal drugs in experimental animals: assessment of myocardial ischemia by myocardial pH.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@Propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@ markedly attenuated the myocardial pH that had been decreased by @<m>DISEASE_Leukocyte_adhesion_deficiency_type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535887 @@@LAD occlusion@@@.

citations.NLM: Abiko Y, Ichihara K, Sakai K, Sashida H, Ishibashi T. A method for evaluating antianginal drugs in experimental animals: assessment of myocardial ischemia by myocardial pH. Methods Find Exp Clin Pharmacol. 1986 May;8(5):271-8. PMID: 2873274
citations.BibTeX: @article{2873274, title={A method for evaluating antianginal drugs in experimental animals: assessment of myocardial ischemia by myocardial pH.}, author={Abiko Y and Ichihara K and Sakai K and Sashida H and Ishibashi T}, journal={Methods Find Exp Clin Pharmacol}, volume={8}, number={5}, pages={271-8}}
